akn:section.akn:heading: Destruction of animals and plant life

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 100752. Destruction of animals and plant life The Secretary may provide for the destruction of such animals and plant life as may be detrimental to the use of any System unit. (Pub. L. 113–287, § 3, Dec. 19, 2014, 128 Stat. 3111.)
Historical and Revision Notes
